description:
Repo steps:
* create new aggregate
* delete aggregate
* create aggregate with the same name as aggregate above

Expected
* aggregate is in the created state

Actual
* aggregate is created but is in the dismissed state
title: Create a new aggregate with same name as deleted not working

comments.content:
Repo steps:
* create new aggregate
* delete aggregate
* create aggregate with the same name as aggregate above

Expected
* aggregate is in the created state

Actual
* aggregate is created but is in the dismissed state
